points.add_comment_desc: If you add a comment, you get any points. You could write max. 5 comments per day.
points.rating_like_desc: If you like / dislike an event, a shop, a product or a service you will get any points. You could maximal like / dislike 5 times per day.
points.register_user_desc: If you create an account on www.createyourevent.org you get any points.
points.register_organizer_desc: If you create an account on www.createyourevent.org you will get any points.
points.register_service_desc: If you create an account on www.createyourevent.org as service, you will get any points.
points.login_desc: If you sign in in your account you will get some points. You could login max. 5 times per day.
points.create_event_desc: If you create an event on www.createyourevent.org and write it out, you will earn some points. You could create maximal 5 events per day.
points.create_shop_desc: If you register a shop on www.createyourevent.org, you will earn some points. Further, for each product, which you register, you will get some points too.
points.create_product_desc: If you register a product in our store for the events, you will get any points. Further, if you sell a product about our plattform, you will earn some points too.
points.create_service_desc: If you register a service, for example a security, a sanitary service or something other, you will get some points. For each service category you will recive the same points.
points.upload_image_product: Upload a product image in product-image-gallery
points.upload_image_product_desc: If you upload any images in the product-image-gallery you will get some points. You could upload maximal 10 pictures per day.
points.upload_image_shop_desc: If you upload a shop-image you will get some points. You could upload too some pictures from your team or like that.
points.upload_image_event_desc: If you upload any image on the event which you create, you will get some points. For each pictures you will get 5 points.
points.rating_stars_desc: If you rate a product, an event or a service, you will get some points. You could maximal rate 5 times per day.
points.title: Points
